response.headline: Seoul Africa Festival 2025 featuring African fashion show and food experiences, Sept 12-13 at Dongdaemun Design Plaza
response.summary: Seoul Africa Festival runs September 12-13 at DDP (Dongdaemun Design Plaza) featuring African models living in Seoul for a fashion show and representative foods from across Africa. The event showcases African culture through fashion and cuisine experiences.

extracted_text: Seoul Africa Festival won't want to miss this!
Meet the faces of this year's SAF Fashion Show - African models living in Seoul
What is your favorite food in your hometown? Have you ever tried these representative foods?
This year's Seoul Africa Festival is also an opportunity to experience various flavors from all over Africa!
Don't miss it again this year! by SAF Crew Joyce
image_details.key_interest: Seoul Africa Festival 2025 dates and location details
